scenes.text: 2026년, 성동구는 공동시설 내 수목정비사업을 공모합니다. 주민 여러분의 많은 참여 바랍니다.
scenes.title: 수목정비사업 공모
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart showing the announcement of the 2026 Sungdong-gu Public Facility Tree Maintenance Project Contest. The chart includes the title "2026년 공동시설 내 수목정비사업 공모" in bold Korean text at the top. Below the title are bullet points highlighting key information: 신청기간: 2026. 1. 26. ~ 2. 6. (Application Period: January 26, 2026 to February 6, 2026), 신청방법: 직접 또는 우편제출 (Application Method: In-person or by mail), 접 수 처: 성동구청 공원녹지과 (Reception: Sungdong-gu Office Parks and Greenery Division), 결과발표: 26. 2. 27. (Result Announcement: February 27, 2026). Each bullet point has a corresponding simple icon related to the content (calendar, mail, building, announcement). The background is a clean, light green color. Korean text is embedded within the infographic elements.
scenes.subtitle: 안전한 생활환경 조성

scenes.title: 신청 기간
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart illustrating the application period for the tree maintenance project. The main title "신청 기간" (Application Period) is displayed prominently at the top in bold Korean text. The subtitle "2026. 1. 26. ~ 2. 6." is shown in a slightly smaller, yet clear font directly below. A calendar icon with the dates highlighted in Korean is placed next to the dates. The overall design is clean and professional, using a pastel color palette.

scenes.text: 직접 또는 우편으로 신청하세요. 2월 6일 18:00까지 도착분에 한합니다.
scenes.title: 신청 방법
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart outlining the application methods. The title "신청 방법" (Application Method) is prominently displayed in bold Korean text at the top. Below it, the subtitle "직접 또는 우편 제출" (In-person or by Mail) is shown. Two icons are present: one representing a person handing in a document and another showing a mailbox with a letter. Important Korean text: 마감일: 2월 6일 18:00 (Deadline: February 6, 6 PM) is embedded below the icons in a slightly smaller font.
scenes.subtitle: 직접 또는 우편 제출

scenes.text: 제출 서류는 신청서와 사업합의서 각 1부입니다. 꼼꼼히 준비하세요.
scenes.title: 제출 서류
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart detailing the required documents for the application. The title "제출 서류" (Required Documents) is displayed in bold Korean text at the top. The subtitle "신청서, 사업합의서 각 1부" (Application Form, Business Agreement - 1 copy each) is shown underneath. Icons representing documents are included. Embedded Korean text: 서류 준비 필수 (Documents Preparation Required) is displayed clearly near the document icons.
scenes.subtitle: 신청서, 사업합의서 각 1부

scenes.title: 결과 발표
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart announcing the result announcement date. The title "결과 발표" (Result Announcement) is prominently displayed in bold Korean text at the top. The subtitle "26. 2. 27. 예정" (Scheduled for February 27, 2026) is shown below. An icon of a calendar with a checkmark is included. Embedded Korean text: 발표일 확인 (Check Announcement Date) is displayed near the calendar icon.
scenes.subtitle: 26. 2. 27. 예정

scenes.title: 문의처
scenes.imagePrompt: An infographic chart providing contact information. The title "문의처" (Contact Information) is displayed in bold Korean text at the top. The subtitle "성동구청 공원녹지과" (Sungdong-gu Office Parks and Greenery Division) is shown underneath. A phone icon is included. Embedded Korean text: 전화: 02-2286-5665 (Phone: 02-2286-5665) is clearly displayed near the phone icon.
scenes.subtitle: 성동구청 공원녹지과
